jobs.title: Flutter developer
jobs.description: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Flutter developer to join our team. As a Flutter developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining mobile applications for Android and iOS using the Flutter framework. You will work closely with our cross-functional team to identify and prioritize project requirements, and deliver high-quality solutions that meet our customers' needs. If you have a passion for mobile app development, a strong understanding of software engineering principles, and excellent problem-solving skills, we want to hear from you.
jobs.must_have_skills: Strong knowledge of Dart programming language, Experience with Flutter framework, Understanding of software engineering principles, Familiarity with Agile development methodologies, Excellent problem-solving skills
jobs.good_to_have_skills: Experience with state management libraries such as Provider or Riverpod, Knowledge of Firebase or other cloud-based services, Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and automated testing

must_have: Strong knowledge of Dart programming language
good_to_have: Experience with state management libraries such as Provider or Riverpod
Knowledge of Firebase or other cloud-based services
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and automated testing

jobs.ai_generated_message:
🚀 Now Hiring: Flutter developer

📍 Location: Bengaluru
🎯 Openings: 5

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Flutter developer to join our team. As a Flutter developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining mobile applications for Android and iOS using the Flutter framework. You will work closely with our cross-functional team to identify and prioritize project requirements, and deliver high-quality solutions that meet our customers' needs. If you have a passion for mobile app development, a strong understanding of software engineering principles, and excellent problem-solving skills, we want to hear from you.

✅ Must-Have Skills:
  • Strong knowledge of Dart programming language
  • Experience with Flutter framework
  • Understanding of software engineering principles
  • Familiarity with Agile development methodologies
  • Excellent problem-solving skills

💡 Nice-to-Have Skills:
  • Experience with state management libraries such as Provider or Riverpod
  • Knowledge of Firebase or other cloud-based services
  • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and automated testing

🔗 Apply Now via the link below!
#Hiring #JobOpening #Careers

jobs.title: Senior Python developer
jobs.description: We are seeking an experienced Senior Python developer to join our team. As a Senior Python developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing large-scale Python applications. You will work collaboratively with our team to identify and prioritize project requirements, develop innovative solutions, and ensure the delivery of high-quality products. If you are a motivated and talented Python developer with a passion for building scalable and efficient systems, we want to hear from you.
jobs.must_have_skills: Strong proficiency in Python 3.x, Experience with Python frameworks such as Django or Flask, Knowledge of database systems such as MySQL or PostgreSQL, Familiarity with Agile development methodologies, Excellent problem-solving skills
jobs.good_to_have_skills: Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure, Knowledge of containerization using Docker, Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins or GitLab CI/CD

must_have: Experience with Python frameworks such as Django or Flask
Knowledge of database systems such as MySQL or PostgreSQL
good_to_have: Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins or GitLab CI/CD
